name: Songer
short_description: Songer is an ID3 tagger designed for the ROX desktop that supports the drag-and-drop nature of ROX. It is designed to be a simple tagging utility. Songer currently only supports MP3s and ID3 version 1 tags. Future support of ID3v2 and OGG files is planne
